title: probounds.create_probounds_crosstab
text:
probounds.create_probounds_crosstab(raw_data, datatype)
Generate a normalized probability bounds crosstab.











Name
Type
Description
Default




raw_data
FrameLike
Observational or experimental data containing trt and outcome columns.
required


datatype
('observational', 'experimental')
The type of study represented by raw_data. Observational data are normalized against the total number of records, while experimental data are normalized within each treatment group.
"observational"














Name
Type
Description





polars.DataFrame
Crosstab with normalized outcome probabilities and an All summary column.














Name
Type
Description





ValueError
Raised when datatype is not supported or when raw_data does not contain any records.

title: probounds.calculate_bounds_combined
text:
probounds.calculate_bounds_combined(
    raw_data_observational,
    raw_data_experimental,
)
Combine observational and experimental datasets to compute bounds.











Name
Type
Description
Default




raw_data_observational
FrameLike
Observational dataset containing trt and outcome columns.
required


raw_data_experimental
FrameLike
Experimental dataset containing trt and outcome columns.
required














Name
Type
Description





dict[str, float]
Combined lower and upper probability bounds.

title: probounds.calculate_bounds_experimental_from_probounds_data
text:
probounds.calculate_bounds_experimental_from_probounds_data(probounds_data)
Compute bounds for experimental data from a crosstab.











Name
Type
Description
Default




probounds_data
polars.DataFrame
Crosstab generated by :func:create_probounds_crosstab for experimental data.
required









Name
Type
Description





dict[str, float]
Lower and upper bounds of the benefit.

title: probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_by_feature
text:
probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_by_feature(df_observed, feature)
Calculate observational bounds for each category of feature.











Name
Type
Description
Default




df_observed
FrameLike
Observational dataset containing the feature column.
required


feature
str
Column on which to partition the data prior to computing bounds.
required














Name
Type
Description





dict[Hashable, dict[str, float]]
Mapping from each feature value to its observational bounds.

title: probounds.probounds_crosstab_feature
text:
probounds.probounds_crosstab_feature(raw_data, datatype, feature)
Build crosstabs for every category of feature.











Name
Type
Description
Default




raw_data
FrameLike
Input dataset that includes the feature column alongside trt and outcome.
required


datatype
('observational', 'experimental')
The type of study represented by raw_data.
"observational"


feature
str
Column used to split the dataset prior to computing crosstabs.
required














Name
Type
Description





dict[Hashable, polars.DataFrame]
Mapping from each feature value to its probability bounds crosstab.

title: Tutorial
text:
import numpy as np
import polars as pl

import probounds.probounds as pb

title: Tutorial
text:
Footnotes


Judea Pearl and Scott Mueller, “Personalized Decision Making,” Causality Blog (April 29, 2021). https://causality.cs.ucla.edu/blog/index.php/2021/04/29/personalized-decision-making/.↩︎

title: Function reference
text:
Create normalized crosstabs from observational and experimental data.



probounds.create_probounds_crosstab
Generate a normalized probability bounds crosstab.


probounds.probounds_crosstab_feature
Build crosstabs for every category of feature.






Use previously computed crosstabs to derive benefit bounds.



probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_from_probounds_data
Compute bounds for observational data from a crosstab.


probounds.calculate_bounds_experimental_from_probounds_data
Compute bounds for experimental data from a crosstab.






Convenience wrappers that operate on raw datasets.



probounds.calculate_bounds_observed
Calculate bounds directly from observational data.


probounds.calculate_bounds_experimental
Calculate bounds directly from experimental data.


probounds.calculate_bounds_combined
Combine observational and experimental datasets to compute bounds.






Evaluate probability bounds for each category of a feature.



probounds.calculate_bounds_observed_by_feature
Calculate observational bounds for each category of feature.


probounds.calculate_bounds_combined_by_feature
Compute combined bounds for each category of feature.

title: get_object
text:
get_object(
    path,
    object_name=None,
    parser='numpy',
    load_aliases=True,
    dynamic=False,
    loader=None,
)
Fetch a griffe object.











Name
Type
Description
Default




path
str
An import path to the object. This should have the form path.to.module:object. For example, quartodoc:get_object or quartodoc:MdRenderer.render.
required


object_name
'str | None'
(Deprecated). A function name.
None


parser
str
A docstring parser to use.
'numpy'


load_aliases

For aliases that were imported from other modules, should we load that module?
True


dynamic

Whether to dynamically import object. Useful if docstring is not hard-coded, but was set on object by running python code.
False






preview: print a user-friendly preview of a griffe object.



>>> get_function("quartodoc", "get_function")
<Function('get_function', ...






Name
Type
Description




x
dc.Object
abc

title: preview
text:
preview(ast, max_depth=999, compact=False, as_string=False)
Print a friendly representation of a griffe object (e.g. function, docstring)


>>> from quartodoc import get_object
>>> obj = get_object("quartodoc", "get_object")
>>> preview(obj.docstring.parsed)
...
>>> preview(obj)
...

title: preview
text:
>>> from quartodoc import get_object
>>> obj = get_object("quartodoc", "get_object")
>>> preview(obj.docstring.parsed)
...
>>> preview(obj)
...

title: probounds.calculate_bounds_combined_by_feature
text:
probounds.calculate_bounds_combined_by_feature(
    df_observed,
    df_experimental,
    feature,
)

Name
Type
Description
Default




df_observed
FrameLike
Observational dataset containing the feature column.
required


df_experimental
FrameLike
Experimental dataset containing the feature column.
required


feature
str
Column on which to partition the data prior to computing bounds.
required














Name
Type
Description





dict[Hashable, dict[str, float]]
Mapping of feature value to the combined probability bounds.
